Name: Interstellar Plus v1.01 [Carry Edition]
Description: CARRY EDITION IS 4 PLAYERS SCALING AT ALL TIMES. REQUIRES CD2 beta update 15 (UPDATED), MEV v5.4 AND DEA b00.3.3+. Recommended VEA. Interstellar, shortened as IS, is a spin off of FC_b23 with some interesting twists on modded enemies. This is the PLUS version which has some changes that increases the difficulty further.
